description:
Jellyfin MPV Shim is a cross-platform cast client for Jellyfin.


Changes:- Add delay between connection and connection validation to reduce connection failures.
- Update skip intro third-party plugin support.
About Windows Downloads:- You do not need administrator rights to install the software.
- You can avoid warnings on files by unblocking the file in the properties dialog.
- You can manually build a release using these instructions.
